Connector Pane State Page (Packed Library Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

Use this page of the Packed Library Properties dialog box to specify whether caller VIs adapt to the memory allocation changes of exported VIs in a packed project library.

This page includes the following component:

  • Callers adapt at run time to Exported VI connector pane state—Specifies whether a caller VI adapts to connector pane changes of the exported VIs without recompiling. If you do not remove the checkmark from the checkbox, the caller VI adapts to connector pane changes of a VI in a packed library. If you remove the checkmark from this checkbox, the caller VI does not adapt and might need to recompile when you make connector pane changes to a VI.
